thread.title: The Rush of Riverfront Living

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: The Rush of Riverfront Living
text:
MANSION The Rush of Riverfront Living Some homeowners are building luxury homes on riverbanks to maximize the meandering views and cooling breezes. But living on the banks can cost a mint.
When Your Pool Has Its Own Living Room More homeowners are building resort-style pools with sunken living rooms and platforms surrounded with water; take a dip without getting wet
A German Villa Hits New Heights
